General.Name: HB Technology CO.LTD
General.Description: HB Technology CO.,LTD. develops, produces, and sells display equipment and component materials in South Korea. The company offers automated optical inspection equipment for display test; encapsulation inspection systems and edge crack testing machines; laser repair equipment for performance of displays; PCB thickness gauges for display test; and high-speed die matching meters. It also provides light guide and diffusion plates for back light units for LCD and LED TVs, and monitors. The company was founded in 1997 and is headquartered in Asan, South Korea.
